MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12pm to replace damaged electrical equipment on Douglas Wynd and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.28am on Wednesday 23rd December 2020.
